g.title: cluster_UC9_4b
g.text: User selected same plan that h...

g.title: cluster_UC9_3a
g.text: User wants to downgrade to fre...

g.title: cluster_UC9_10a
g.text: System changed the plan to fre...

g.title: cluster_UC9_6a
g.text: User wants to change credit ca...

g.title: cluster_UC9_5a
g.text: User wants to change billing i...

a.xlink:title: User initiates change of the plan.
System presents information about current plan and available plans.
User selects upgrade to paid plan. #(mark:wants_paid_plan)
System evaluates that user has free plan associated and wants to upgrade to paid plan.
User selects downgrade to free plan. #(guard:!free_plan) #(unmark:wants_paid_plan)
System checks that it has billing information of the user.
System skips billing information and credit card selection. #(guard:!free_plan & !wants_paid_plan) #(goto:7)
System informs user that he has the selected plan already associated. #(guard:free_plan & !wants_paid_plan | !free_plan & wants_paid_plan)
System checks that it has credit card of the user.
User provides billing information. #(include:UC12)
System presents review of the plan change and presents terms and conditions.
User provides credit card information. #(include:UC13)
User confirms the plan change.
System computes first payment according to days left to the end of the current month and substracts it from the credit card.
Use case aborts. #(abort)
System changed the plan to the paid one. #(unmark:free_plan) #(delete:free_plan)
System shows message to user that the payment failed.
Use case finishes. #(guard:!wants_paid_plan) #(mark:free_plan) #(emit:free_plan)
Use case aborts. #(abort)
Use case aborts. #(abort)
UC13 Change credit card
UC12 Change billing information
